name: Lost Lune ~ the foreign god's eternal night
name_original: Lost Lune ~ the foreign god's eternal night
description:
A decade has passed since the foreign god’s appearance, filling it with madness and destroying over a quarter of humanity within the first few months. Humanity has fought back but is still on its last legs against anomalous humanoid creatures with logic-defying powers. One of these fighters, Herber, loses their partner in a recent attack and has to fight to get them back against all odds.

Play as Herber Weiss (they/them), a Scavenging leader for one of the last strongholds of humanity as they fight against the hordes.

in here you will find...

🌙  5k words - the first 2 days of an estimated 60k+ project

🌙 4 main characters to meet with more planned for the full demo

🌙 2 brief action scenes

read more about the project on our website
